page.title: 16Shopping
page.content: {South Woodham Ferrers}has a compact shopping centre which comprises many shops, the largest of which is Asda. Most of the residents prefer to shop for groceries in their own area. Only about 18% shop elsewhere. They buy their groceries from Wickford, Maldon, Rayleigh or Basildon. The story is completely reversed when it comes to buying clothes for the family. Only 15% prefer to shop in {South Woodham Ferrers}whereas 62% buy clothes in Chelmsford and in Basildon. Other places chosen for buying clothes include Southend, Romford, London, Maldon, Wickford and abroad. The most popular places for Christmas shopping are Chelmsford and Southend with{South Woodham Ferrers and Basildon as second choice. Other places include Oxford Street, Maldon, Romford, Wickford, Harlow & Nottingham
